description.narrative:
The objective of this initative is to support practical activities focussed on ensuring an effective response to the Australian Government’s national security agenda, establishing and enhancing engagement with WoG stakeholders in particular the ADF &#38;#38; AFP and to engage in international policy dialogue on issues of fragility and conflict to inform Australia’s position globally.
Activities under this initiative will contribute to the Crisis Prevention, Stabilisation &#38;#38; Recovery Groups (CPSRG)’s Business Unit Plan (BUP) objective 1.1: Support AusAID to engage with international, national and whole-of-government partners on issues of fragility, conflict and national security.

participating-org.narrative: Australia - Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
